mapper.select: SELECT b.businessId , bp.pic AS pic , b.title , b.businessName , min(p.price) AS price , AVG(r.score) AS score , COUNT(r.reviewId) AS reviewNumbers FROM `like` l JOIN business b ON l.businessId = b.businessId LEFT JOIN business_pic bp ON b.businessId = bp.businessId LEFT JOIN product p ON b.businessId = p.businessId JOIN service s ON p.productId = s.productId -- productId와 service 테이블을 연결 LEFT JOIN review r ON s.serviceId = r.serviceId -- serviceId와 review 테이블을 연결 WHERE l.userId = #{userId} -- 여기에 클라이언트로부터 받은 userId를 바인딩 GROUP BY b.businessId, b.title, b.businessName;
